title: Fun Territory Defense of the Easy-Going Lord ~The Nameless Village Is Made Into the Strongest Fortified City by Production Magic~ - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Child Protagonist   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdom Building   Magic   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Multiple POV   Nobles   Polygamy   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars
author: Akaike Sou   赤池宗
description: The child of an aristocrat, Van, suddenly remembers his past life when he became two years old. Van was once rumored to be a child prodigy. However, at the age of eight, He was found to have had an aptitude for production magic, a useless aptitude. He was then promptly banished from his noble family. Braving the hardships of village life, Van continues to develop and defend his village. Soon, the nameless village is turned into a city... though it would be nice if the dragons stopped attacking us.>
